Package com.ibm.streams.management

Class ObjectNameBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.streams.management.ObjectNameBuilder
public class ObjectNameBuilder extends Object
ObjectNameBuilder provides methods to build object names for the Streams managed beans. Note: values within the generated ObjectName are quoted if they could contain special characters. Properties which can contain special characters include: domain names, instance names, principal names and resource identifiers.

  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectNameBuilder

      public ObjectNameBuilder(String type)
      Creates a new ObjectNameBuilder object for building Streams object names.
      Parameters:
      type - identifies the type of managed bean for which the object name is built. Possible values are:
      DomainActiveServiceMXBean.TYPE
      DomainMXBean.TYPE
      DomainMXBean.PROPERTY_GROUP_TYPE
      DomainServiceMXBean.TYPE
      ZooKeeperEnsembleMXBean.TYPE
      ZooKeeperNodeMXBean.TYPE
      InstanceActiveServiceMXBean.TYPE
      InstanceMXBean.TYPE
      InstanceMXBean.PROPERTY_GROUP_TYPE
      InstanceServiceMXBean.TYPE
      JobMXBean.TYPE
      OperatorConnectionMXBean.TYPE
      OperatorInputPortMXBean.TYPE
      OperatorMXBean.TYPE
      PeConnectionMXBean.TYPE
      PeInputPortMXBean.TYPE
      PeMXBean.TYPE
      PeOutputPortMXBean.TYPE
      ResourceMXBean.TYPE
      ResourceMXBean.RESOURCE_MANAGER_TYPE
      PrincipalMXBean.DOMAIN_TYPE
      PrincipalMXBean.INSTANCE_TYPE
      SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.DOMAIN_TYPE
      SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.INSTANCE_TYPE

  • Method Details

    • append

      public ObjectNameBuilder append(String key, String value)
      Appends a specified key, value pair to the end of the object name.
      Parameters:
      key - specifies the key to add.
      value - specifies the value to add.
      Returns:
      the ObjectNameBuilder object.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any parameter value is null.

    • append

      public ObjectNameBuilder append(String key, String value, boolean quoted)
      Appends a specified key, value pair to the end of the object name. The value is optionally quoted when added to the object name. Value names need to be quoted if they could contain special characters. Object name properties which can contain special characters include: domain names, instance names, principal names and resource identifiers.
      Parameters:
      key - specifies the key to add.
      value - specifies the value to add.
      quoted - identifies whether the value should be quoted in the object name.
      Returns:
      the ObjectNameBuilder object.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any parameter value is null.

    • toObjectName

      public ObjectName toObjectName()
      Returns the ObjectName that is represented by the current state of the ObjectNameBuilder object
      Returns:
      the ObjectName generated from the ObjectNameBuilder or null if the ObjectNameBuilder state does not resolve to a valid ObjectName.

      public static ObjectName zooKeeperEnsemble(String domain, String ensemble)

      • JobMXBean

    • jobOperationListener

      public static ObjectName jobOperationListener(String domain, String instance, BigInteger jobId, String listenerId)
      Build an ObjectName for a job operation listener managed bean.
      Parameters:
      domain - specifies the name of a Streams domain.
      instance - specifies the name of a Streams instance within the domain.
      jobId - specifies a unique identifier for a job within the instance.
      listenerId - identifies an operation listener used for tracking the status of operations.
      Returns:
      the generated ObjectName
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any parameter value is null.

      • OperationListenerMXBean
